get.summary: Get Conversation based metrics

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: start date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: end date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Denotes the dimension in metrics- Eg: status - provides the conversation status- ATTENDED OR MISSED OR ETC

parameters.name: dimensionValue
parameters.description: Denotes dimensionValues required in dimension- Eg: ATTENDED - will provide the count of attended conv. in given timerange

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Filter conversations metrics by channelId

parameters.name: agentIds
parameters.description: Filter conversations metrics by agentId

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Provide metrics with time granularity

parameters.name: basedOn
parameters.description: Provides the info.on which criteria data need to be- Eg: CONTACT_LASTACTIVE- starttime and endtime will be considered based on contact_last_active_time column

parameters.name: integrationServiceId
parameters.description: IntegrationService type

get.summary: Get Message based metrics

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: start date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: end date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Denotes the dimension in metrics - Eg: direction - metrics based on message direction like incoming and outgoing

parameters.name: dimensionValue
parameters.description: Denotes dimensionValues required in dimension-Eg: INCOMING- will get the incoming message count

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Filter conversations metrics by channelId

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Provide metrics with time granularity

parameters.name: integrationServiceId
parameters.description: IntegrationService type

get.summary: Get Session based metrics

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: start date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: end date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Denotes the dimension in metrics - Eg: responsiveness - it gives how responsive the sessions in particular time duration- eg: avg pickup time

parameters.name: dimensionValue
parameters.description: Denotes dimensionValues required in dimension-Eg: Avg Pickup Time, Avg Response time etc.

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Filter Session metrics by channelId

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Provide metrics with time granularity

parameters.name: basedOn
parameters.description: Used to select the required metrics, based on Session Started time or Ended Time

parameters.name: integrationServiceId
parameters.description: IntegrationService type

get.summary: Get Payment based metrics

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: start date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: end date for metrics. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Denotes the dimension in metrics - Eg: wa_credit_usage - it gives credit usage summary of Whatsapp Integration

parameters.name: dimensionValue
parameters.description: Denotes dimensionValues required in dimension-Eg: WA_BUSINESS_INITIATED

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: Filter Session metrics by channelId

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Provide metrics with time granularity

get.summary: Get Agent's Performance metrics

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for metrics.Its a mandatory Param. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for metrics.Its a mandatory Param. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: attributeGroup
parameters.description: Denotes which attribute group data is required. Eg: responsiveness - AVG_RESPONSE_TIME comes under responsiveness group. It's Mandatory Param

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Denotes metrics required. Its a mandatory Param. Eg: AVG_RESPONSE_TIME of agent

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: To filter Agent Metrics only on a list of channelIds. It's a Optional Param

parameters.name: agentIds
parameters.description: To get Agent Metrics only for particular Agents. It's a Optional Param

parameters.name: basedOn
parameters.description: To get Agent Metrics based on the Conversation Started time or Ended Time. It's a Optional Param

parameters.name: integrationServiceId
parameters.description: IntegrationService type
